thread.title: New York Lawmakers Pass Bill to Halt NYC Plastic Bag Fee
thread.title_full: New York Lawmakers Pass Bill to Halt NYC Plastic Bag Fee - WSJ

author: Mike Vilensky
title: New York Lawmakers Pass Bill to Halt NYC Plastic Bag Fee
text:
ALBANY—The state Legislature on Tuesday passed a bill that would halt a forthcoming five-cent fee on plastic bags in New York City.
The bill now goes to Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s desk, giving Mr. Cuomo the opportunity to kill or to save a polarizing environmental policy pushed by his longtime Democratic rival, New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio.
...
